character.age: 217 years old, yet appears to be in his mid-30s
character.background: Azrael was born into a family of powerful vampires, but after a falling out with his family, he set out on a journey to find his place in the world. He has walked among humans for centuries, studying them and learning from them.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Pitch black, often worn in a stylishly messy manner
